/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban architecture. A large overpass, painted in shades of gray and white, stretches across the center of the image, serving as a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with buildings, roads, and infrastructure coexisting harmoniously.
